name: NumberFormatter.Style
desc: The predefined number format styles used by the numberStyle property.

items.name: case spellOut
items.desc: A style format in which numbers are spelled out in the language defined by the number formatter locale.

items.name: case currency
items.desc: A currency style format that uses the currency symbol defined by the number formatter locale.

items.name: case currencyAccounting
items.desc: An accounting currency style format that uses the currency symbol defined by the number formatter locale.

items.name: case currencyISOCode
items.desc: A currency style format that uses the ISO 4217 currency code defined by the number formatter locale.

items.name: case currencyPlural
items.desc: A currency style format that uses the pluralized denomination defined by the number formatter locale.
